price: 92. Dan taatlah kamu kepada Allah dan taatlah kamu kepada Rasul serta berhati-hatilah. Jika kamu berpaling, maka ketahuilah bahwa kewajiban Rasul Kami, hanyalah menyampaikan (amanat) dengan jelas.
arabic: وَأَطِيعُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُواْ ٱلرَّسُولَ وَٱحۡذَرُواْۚ فَإِن تَوَلَّيۡتُمۡ فَٱعۡلَمُوٓاْ أَنَّمَا عَلَىٰ رَسُولِنَا ٱلۡبَلَٰغُ ٱلۡمُبِينُ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Sabeq Company
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Sabeq Company, printed in 2016. corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wa-aṭīʿū al-laha wa-aṭīʿū al-rasūla wa-iḥ'dharū fa-in tawallaytum fa-iʿ'lamū annamā ʿalā rasūlinā al-balāghu al-mubīnu
